name: FooterLogoEmphasis
description: Footer with prominent centered logo emphasis and grid-based navigation layout with chevron icons.

columns.note: Grid automatically adjusts from 1-5 columns based on array length

structure.label: string - Link text (required)
structure.href: string - Link destination (optional). External URLs open in new tab, internal values scroll to sections

logo.note: Uses logoText for SVG text logo

propsSchema.columns: Array<{ items: Array<{ label: string, href?: string, onClick?: () => void }> }> - Footer navigation columns (required, max 5)

usageExample: <FooterLogoEmphasis columns={[{ items: [{ label: 'Features', href: 'features' }] }, { items: [{ label: 'About', href: 'about' }] }]} logoText="Company" />
dont: Do not use more than 4 items
